summary: A family of fiercely independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.

Bernard|Charles Bidwell|Robert Bryant|Charles Horvath|Richard Lee Mason|Ben McMahan|Marina Lisa Moore|Martita Lara Moore|Arthur S. Newman Jr.|Melissa Newman|Jon Morgan Woodward
title: Casta invencible
